title: Create an object container
s3LegalMentions: S3 is a registered trademark of Amazon Technologies, Inc. OVHcloud services are not sponsored, approved, or affiliated in any way.
createContainerErrorTitle: An error occurred while creating the object container
createContainerSuccessTitle: The object container {{name}} has been created
descriptionOffsiteReplication: Automatically replicate your data to a remote site using an Infrequent Access storage class. <0>Learn more </0>
descriptionVersioning: Automates the creation of versions of an object to prevent accidental deletion, or simply when a new object is uploaded.
descriptionUser: You can grant access to the container to one of your preconfigured OpenStack users with an "Administrator" or "Object Storage Operator" role, or create a new user.
descriptionEncryption: The data dumped into this container is encrypted on the fly by OVHcloud.
pricingDisclaimer: For more information on pricing, <0>see the pricing page</0>.
regionActivationInfo: If a region is not yet available on your project, you can activate it through this link: <0>Activate Region</0>.
regionsNoMatch: No regions match your filters. Adjust your criteria or <0>activate a region</0>.
discoveryModeActivate: You are currently in Discovery mode. To finish creating your container, you must activate your project.
nameInputMinLengthError: The name must contain at least {{min}} characters
nameInputMaxLengthError: The name must contain a maximum of {{max}} characters
nameInputRegexError: The name must start and end with a letter or number, and can only contain lowercase letters, numbers, “.” or “-”
containerTypeDescription-static: Quick and efficient access for your websites. Link your domains and upload your files.
containerTypeDescription-private: Billing, legal information, logs. Archive it simply, in a way that suits you.
containerTypeDescription-public: Multimedia, binaries, e-commerce. Store an enormous amount of data.
encryptionTypeLabel-AES256: Server-side encryption with keys managed by OVHcloud (SSE-OMK)
encryptionTypeDescription-AES256: OVHcloud Managed Keys are handled and used on your behalf via OVHcloud’s secure KMS-integrated service.
offerTypeDescription-storage-s3-standard: A wide range of S3-compatible features. Available in 1-AZ, 3-AZ and Local Zones across different storage classes.
offerTypeDescription-storage: A basic storage solution with no specific requirements for performance. This is the OpenStack native object storage, with Swift APIs.
versionningTypeDisabledPopover: Versioning cannot be disabled because you have enabled replication. Edit the Offsite Replication step if you want to disable it.
offsiteReplicationVersioningAlert: Versioning is also enabled by enabling Offsite Replication.
pci_instances_common_instance_region_dep: Resilient and low cost deployment in 1 availability zone.
pci_instances_common_instance_region-3-a: High resilience/high availability deployment for your critical applications across 3 availability zones.
pci_instances_common_instance_localzone_: Deploy your applications as close to your users as possible for low latency and data residency.
nameInputInfo: The container name must be between 3 and 63 characters, must start and end with lower-case alphanumeric characters (a to z and 0 to 9), and may include the following punctuation marks: ‘.’ and ‘-’.
descriptionObjectLock: With Object Lock, store objects in WORM (Write Once, Read Many) mode, ensuring their integrity by preventing any modification or deletion after writing. <0>Learn more</0>
objectLockTypeDisabledPopover: To enable the Object Lock feature, versioning must be enabled
objectLockCannotDisableAlert: At this stage, only the activation of the feature is offered. The detailed configuration of Object Lock (mode, retention period, etc.) will take place after the bucket is created. Please note that this action is irreversible: once enabled, Object Lock cannot be disabled on the bucket.
objectLockAcknowledgementLabel: I understand how the Object Lock feature works and its implications. <0>Learn more</0>
objectLockAcknowledgementRequired: You must acknowledge how Object Lock works before continuing
